item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: My account
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: <!-- wp:shortcode -->[woocommerce_my_account]<!-- /wp:shortcode -->

item.title: Intro to Numpy
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: In this section, you will be introduced to the NumPy library to add functions and methods to the program without actually writing the code.

item.title: Joining NumPy Arrays
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: There are three different modules to join Numpy arrays: vstack, hstack, and column stack. You will learn all these methods one by one in this module.

item.title: Numpy Intersection & Difference
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: We shall understand what sect difference and intersection are at the beginning of this section. We shall then understand how to extract the exact elements by excluding other elements from the array with demonstrated code snippets.

item.title: Numpy Array Mathematics
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section will explain and demonstrate working with various mathematical operations using arrays like sum, increment, mean and median.

Courses

Make learning and teaching more effective with active participation and student collaboration [tutor_course orderby="ID" order="desc" count="9" column_per_row='3' course_filter='on']

Our Story

Empowering women in tech with financial tools & a supportive community, driving gender equality and innovation in the tech industry. Join us today and be part of the change!

Inspiration

"Inspiring a generation of women in tech to rise above limitations, embrace innovation, and lead with unwavering determination. TechHeroines is a platform where dreams find wings, as we foster an inclusive community that thrives on collaboration and empowerment. Together, we shatter glass ceilings, ignite change, and create a future where diversity is celebrated and brilliance knows no bounds. Join us on this transformative journey, where every woman's potential becomes a force for revolutionary impact in the tech landscape and beyond."

Mission & Vision

 TechHeroines is on a mission to empower women in tech through innovative tools, resources, and a strong community, fostering groundbreaking achievements and driving gender equality. Our vision is to create a world where women thrive in technology, leading the way with brilliance, creativity, and unwavering determination, reshaping the future of the tech industry and beyond.

Things that make us proud

Choose your learning level

Beginner

With analytics tools, to help you share with current and future clients.

Advanced

All services for our team of industry experts, personal training.

Intermediate

Total collections, quoting, enrollment, and reporting in Italian and English.

Mastery

We can help you set up and manager your groups if you are become our partner.

item.title: Women in STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics)
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded:
Women in STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) refers to the representation and participation of women in these fields. Historically, STEM fields have been male-dominated, but there has been a growing effort to encourage and support women's involvement and achievements in these areas.

Over the years, there have been significant advancements in promoting gender diversity in STEM, but challenges still exist. Some key points regarding women in STEM include:

  1. Gender Gap: Women continue to be underrepresented in various STEM fields, including engineering, computer science, and physics. The gender gap is evident in both academia and industry.
  2. Encouraging Diversity: Increasing diversity in STEM is crucial as it brings different perspectives, ideas, and approaches to problem-solving, leading to innovation and progress.
  3. Role Models: The presence of female role models, such as scientists, engineers, and technologists, can inspire and encourage young women to pursue STEM careers.
  4. Education and Outreach: Efforts are being made to provide more opportunities for girls and young women to access quality education and training in STEM subjects.
  5. Overcoming Stereotypes: Societal stereotypes and biases about gender and STEM roles can influence career choices. Challenging these stereotypes is essential to create a more inclusive environment.
  6. Support Networks: Creating supportive environments, mentorship programs, and networks can help women in STEM overcome challenges and excel in their careers.
  7. Advocacy and Policy: Advocacy groups and policymakers play a significant role in promoting policies that support gender equity in STEM, including equal pay and opportunities for career advancement.
  8. Recognizing Achievements: Celebrating the accomplishments of women in STEM fields helps showcase their contributions and encourages more women to pursue similar paths.

Increasing the representation of women in STEM not only benefits gender equality but also contributes to scientific and technological advancements, economic growth, and a more inclusive and innovative society. Efforts to address the gender gap and promote diversity in STEM continue to be essential for building a better future.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded:
Our Story

Make learning and teaching more effective with active participation and student collaboration

Mission & Vision

Comprehensive Financial Empowerment: Tech-Heroines provides financial literacy resources, budgeting tools, and microfinance options tailored to women entrepreneurs, promoting financial empowerment.

 

Supportive Digital Community: The platform fosters a supportive digital community where women can connect, collaborate, and share experiences, creating a network of like-minded professionals.

 

Mentorship Opportunities: Tech-Heroines facilitates mentorship connections, allowing experienced women to guide and support aspiring entrepreneurs in their tech journeys.

 

Skill Development: Through workshops and webinars, the app supports skill development and knowledge sharing, nurturing entrepreneurship and leadership skills.

 

Gender Equality Advocacy: The platform advocates for gender equality in the tech industry, creating awareness and influencing positive change.

Background

Market Research: We conducted in-depth market research to understand the needs of women entrepreneurs and competitors' offerings.

 

Collaborative Development: A skilled team of developers, designers, and project managers collaborated to build the app.

 

Iterative Development: We adopted an iterative approach, continuously refining features based on user feedback and evolving needs.

 

User-Centric Design: Tech-Heroines was built with a user-centric design, prioritizing usability and an intuitive interface.

 

Pre-Launch Marketing: A pre-launch marketing strategy generated excitement and awareness to attract users.

Things that make us proud

Choose your learning level

Beginner

With analytics tools, to help you share with current and future clients.

Advanced

All services for our team of industry experts, personal training.

Intermediate

Total collections, quoting, enrollment, and reporting in Italian and English.

Mastery

We can help you set up and manager your groups if you are become our partner.

Our Team

Devon Lane

Professor

Courtney Henry

Assistant Professor

Jane Cooper

Assistant Professor

Esther Howard

Visual Artist

\u00a0<\/p>

\u00a0<\/p>

Skill Development: Through workshops and webinars, the app supports skill development and knowledge sharing, nurturing entrepreneurship and leadership skills.<\/p>

\u00a0<\/p>

item.title: STEM Wonder Women
item.dc:creator: kasthu
item.content:encoded:
Campaign Goal: The "STEM Wonder Women" campaign aims to promote and empower women's participation and achievements in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) fields. The campaign seeks to inspire more girls and young women to pursue careers in STEM and break down gender barriers in these industries. Key Objectives:
  1. Celebrate Female Role Models: Highlight the accomplishments and contributions of successful women in STEM through interviews, profiles, and success stories. Showcase their achievements to inspire and motivate young girls.
  2. Encourage Education and Mentorship: Collaborate with schools, colleges, and universities to encourage girls to take an active interest in STEM subjects. Organize mentorship programs where female students can connect with accomplished women in STEM fields.
  3. Host Empowerment Workshops: Organize workshops that focus on building confidence, leadership skills, and resilience in young women pursuing STEM careers.
  4. Create Online Resources: Develop an online platform with resources such as webinars, tutorials, and learning materials that are targeted at supporting and guiding women in STEM.
  5. Industry Partnerships: Partner with tech companies, research institutions, and STEM organizations to create more internship and job opportunities for women in STEM fields.
  6. Challenge Stereotypes: Launch a social media campaign to challenge gender stereotypes in STEM by showcasing diverse and inclusive representations of women in various STEM roles.
  7. Public Awareness Events: Organize public events, seminars, and conferences to raise awareness about the gender gap in STEM and the importance of promoting diversity in these fields.
  8. Sponsorship and Scholarships: Establish sponsorship programs and scholarships to support financially disadvantaged girls and women pursuing STEM education.
  9. Advocacy and Policy Change: Work with policymakers and advocate for policies that promote gender equality in STEM education and employment opportunities.
  10. Measurement and Evaluation: Regularly assess the impact of the campaign through surveys, feedback, and data analysis to track progress and make improvements.
By implementing the "STEM Wonder Women" campaign, we aim to create a positive and inclusive environment where women in STEM can thrive, contribute their unique perspectives, and be recognized for their exceptional talents and achievements. This campaign will pave the way for a brighter future with increased gender diversity, innovation, and progress in STEM fields.
item.excerpt:encoded: "STEM Wonder Women" is a campaign focused on empowering women in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) fields. The campaign aims to celebrate female role models, encourage education and mentorship, challenge stereotypes, and promote gender diversity in STEM. Through workshops, online resources, and industry partnerships, the campaign seeks to inspire and support more girls and young women to pursue rewarding careers in STEM and contribute to innovation and progress in these industries.

Make learning and teaching more effective with active participation and student collaboration

item.title: Crowd Funding
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site

item.title: Saving and Loading Numpy Array
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: We will understand how to load and store a NumPy array in this section. We shall learn to work with arrays, starting from creating a NumPy array to storing and loading it with demonstrated sample codes.

item.title: Intro to Pandas
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: We shall understand Panel Data for data manipulation and analysis in Python.

item.title: Pandas Series Object
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: We shall understand one-dimensional labeled arrays in this section. We will learn to import the Pandas library, create a series object using the inbuilt data type, and work with it with demonstrated code snippets.

item.title: Intro to Pandas Dataframe
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: After understanding the basics of Pandas Dataframe, you will learn to work with it through a sample demonstration in this section.

item.title: Pandas Functions
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: We shall discuss the Pandas functions like mean, median, maximum, and minimum in this section. We shall also understand working with different methods for each of these functions.

item.title: What is HTML?
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: In this module, you will be introduced to the HyperText Markup Language (HTML) and discuss the extension used to save the HTML files.

item.title: HTML Features
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module explains the HTML features that makes HTML the main building block of any website with its features such as videos, audios, and graphics.

item.title: HTML Editors
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module shares information on different types of editors that can be used for writing HTML, like Notepad, Notepad++, Atom, and Sublime Text.

item.title: HTML Skeleton
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module will assist you in becoming acquainted with the skeleton of the HTML document. That is nothing but you will get to comprehend all the tags involved in writing and their significance.

item.title: HTML Comments
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: In this module, you will learn how to write comments in HTML. You will also go through the three ways of adding comments with the help of code examples.

item.title: HTML Elements
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module helps you learn about HTML elements and their usage. The basic HTML structure and the usage of its elements are illustrated with appropriate code examples.

item.title: Types of Elements
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module focuses on the types of HTML elements - Block level and Inline. The block-level concept is explained in-depth with appropriate code demonstration for better understanding.

item.title: Basic Tags
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: Tags define the basic structure of a web page this module discusses on basic HTML tags such as, <p>,<strong>, <em>, <ol>, <ul>,<li>,<div>,<span>, <a>, and self closing tags like <hr>, <br>, <img> all of which are explained in detail with the help of the coding examples.

item.title: Table Tag
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: Table is used to arrange data in the form of rows and columns. This module focuses on the HTML table tag for creating an HTML table. The process of creating a table and the essential tags used are demonstrated with code examples.

item.title: What is CSS?
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section answers what Cascading Style Sheets are. It also says how HTML is associated with CSS and how JavaScript codes are imbibed in CSS snippets.

item.title: History of CSS
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section gives insights into what was used before CSS was explicitly released as a tool and also includes history of how it was developed.

item.title: CSS Editors
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section includes a brief on several CSS editors, like Atom, Brackets, Espresso, Notepad++, Komodo Edit, and Sublime Text, which you can use to style your HTML codes in CSS. You can choose from the pool after learning which tool is best suited for what purpose.

item.title: Basic Structure of CSS
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section helps you understand the basic structure of CSS. It includes the syntax to define selectors, attributes, and values to make the code well designed.

item.title: Comments in CSS
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: Comments are not the display part on the website or the webpage but make the critical part of codes. It helps understand what and why the particular chunk of code is written for. You will understand briefly about comments in this section.

item.title: Where to Write
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: In the first chapter, you will learn about JavaScript code and the ways of writing it. The video lecture explains how to write JavaScript code using the console, script tags, and an External js file.

item.title: Comments and JavaScript Properties
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section explains comments and why they are used while writing JavaScript code. Also, properties of JavaScript, such as the data types used while declaring variables, are discussed.

item.title: Conditional Statements in JavaScript
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module discusses the basics of conditional statements, the importance of these statements, the different types of conditional statements used, such as if-else case, switch case, and different ways to use conditional statements.

item.title: Loops in JavaScript
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: In this module, what loops are, why they are important, multiple variations of loops such as for loop, while loop, Do-While loop, and what are the different ways for defining loops in the code are explained.

item.title: Importance and Applications of Programming Languages
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section discusses how programming can benefit in performing various tasks and points out to its various industry-related applications.

item.title: Variables in Programming
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section defines and explains various variables used in any programming language.

item.title: Decision Making Statements
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section discusses the relevance where conditions are involved to choose between “if” or “else” situations with real-time examples.

item.title: Looping Statements
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section discusses how a machine performs repeating tasks until the condition is satisfied with the real-time example.

item.title: Functions in Programming
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section explains how a machine understands functions by pointing out real-time examples.

item.title: What is Java?
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module will help you get briefly acquainted with Java and understand why it is generally known as cross-platform compatible and object-oriented.

item.title: Install Java & Java IDE
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module gives you detailed information and a demo of installing Java IDE- Eclipse on your system.

item.title: First Java Program
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module will go through the first Java program that will help you comprehend its syntax and semantics. For your better understanding, a hands-on demo is also available.

item.title: Variables and Data Types in Java
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module will brief you about variables in Java with appropriate examples. Secondly, you will get familiar with data types in Java which are thoroughly explained with the help of examples.

item.title: Operators in Java
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module focuses on operators in Java. Arithmetic, logical, and relational operators are explained in detail with the help of code examples.

item.title: Introduction to PHP
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: PHP serves as a programming language for server-side scripting that is used to build web pages and web applications. This module briefs you on PHP, its syntax, and its applications.

item.title: PHP Installation
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This module helps you install and configure PHP on your system.

item.title: Comments in PHP
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: It is always best practice to provide source code details in a program, which can be achieved with the help of comments. This module explains comments and their syntax and demonstrates how to write single and multiline comments.

item.title: Variables in PHP
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: A variable is a space where data values are stored. In this module, you will learn about variables in PHP. With the help of hands-on examples, you will learn how to perform variable declarations and define variables in PHP.

item.title: Variables Scope
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: In this module, you will learn about three types of variables scope and understand their role and syntax through hands-on examples.

item.title: Course Overview
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: SQL is a query processing language and Data Science is all about managing and manipulating data. This SQL for Data Science course gives you insights on how SQL is used in Data Science applications.

item.title: Intro to Clauses
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded:
This section discusses clauses. You shall understand to fetch data from a single table or by combining multiple tables using GROUP BY and HAVING statements.
Group By Statement

item.title: Group By Statement
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section helps you understand GROUP BY statements in SQL and learn to group the elements based on conditions written after the query statement.

item.title: Demo for Group By Statement
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section will help you have practical exposure to group elements using GROUP BY clauses in the tables using the GROUP BY statement. It is handy to fetch data when the criterion is known.

item.title: Having Clause Statement
item.dc:creator: tech-heroines.site
item.content:encoded: This section discusses the HAVING clause and explains the aggregation in the instances it is used.
